name: FinalBuilder 7 Project
summary: Learn about .FBP7 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: FinalBuilder projects are also saved with the .FBZ7 extension, which is the default extension used for FinalBuilder 7 projects. FBZ7 files use compression to reduce the file size.
NOTE: Some versions of Embarcadero Delphi include FinalBuilder.

description: Project file created by FinalBuilder 7, an application used for building a software development project into a final Windows program; contains build properties and references to the file required for building the final program; can be used for automated builds.
